website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and durable, this whimsically-colored set includes 11 knives, a sharpener, scissors, and a knife block. Just be sure to wash them by hand.
pros: Comes with 8" chef knife, 7" Santoku knife, 8" bread knife, 5" utility knife, 3.5" paring knife, 6 steak knives, sharpener, kitchen scissors, and rubberwood block
cons: Must be washed by hand and dried promptly to prevent rust

customer_reviews.title: Half the knives are rusted, only had for 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knives almost 2 and a half months ago and half of the knives are already rusted! I hand wash and leave them standing to dry, but I’ve already set one aside to throw away because I don’t want to touch food with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D.

customer_reviews.title: VERY UPSET with this purchase. RUST-RUST-RUST.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had these set up in my kitchen for one whole month yet, and I just used them for the first time 4 days ago. I hand wash them the two times I’ve used them and the two knifes I’ve used are rusting immediately. I regret my purchase and wish I would have purchased a different set of knifes. I’m upset that I spent this much money on them. It’s unfortunate to be stuck with knifes that I purchased at the end of last month (August) that are rusting after two uses and two hand washes.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmi Mroz

customer_reviews.title: Well, I like the color...
customer_reviews.text: These knives are good for what they cost. I can’t complain much since my other knives were nearly falling apart, however they’re comparable to them. My favorite part about these knives is the color, because they definitely don’t cut smoothly or seem to be very well made. The block itself is jagged so the knives don’t line up evenly & it irks me.
customer_reviews.author: Citrus Rays

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews about scratches and did not experience that with ours. We love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K. Leon

customer_reviews.title: I should have returned these
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in how thick the blades are at the bottom where they should be thin to make slicing and cutting easier. These are all serrated edges and they look great on my countertop but I regret buying them because they are not that efficient and they are difficult to use
customer_reviews.author: Alexis566

customer_reviews.title: Not the sharpest knives in the block!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to replace an aging set of similar knives from a different manufacturer. They appeared to be similar, but we found them to be duller and when we tried sharpening them, they didn't come up to the same standard as our old set. The delivery time was far longer than we had expected, as well. Sad to say, we did return them and will wait until we find a set that meets our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: FiOS-Dave

customer_reviews.title: RUSTY KNIVES!
customer_reviews.text: When I got these and opened them it looked like there was a rust spot on one, but I wasn't sure. After cleaning them and putting them on my counter, they look cute. Color is off but that can happen. I've only used 3 of them once! The scissors, the big knife and a little knife. THEY ARE RUSTED!!!! not just the ones I used. Little spots here and there on a majority of them. These RUST! Do not spend your money because you will be throwing these in the trash like me.
customer_reviews.author: SHAWNA DITCH

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a very nice and sharp set of kitchen knives, with the exception of.........
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a very nice and sharp set of kitchen knives! Almost every blade is serrated. Which is what I was looking for in a knife set. It has 8 serrated steak knives! And the handles look really nice. The only thing I don't like, is the lazy Susan on the bottom of the wooden block. I plan on removing that. Other wise, I definitely give it a 100! <<<Update 5/28/18>>> I had to drop my rating to 4 stars. Because, these are not dish washer safe. The steel starts to rust if you wash them in the dish washer. The only way we could keep the rust off. Is to hand wash with a green scrubbing pad.
customer_reviews.author: Lonestar 38

customer_reviews.title: Dull Blades
customer_reviews.text: I just moved in with my fiancee and was in the market for a starter knife block set. I saw these Oster Knives and decided to give them a try even with some of the bad reviews. I loved the color. The set is really great. However, the knives are extremely dull. The scissors wouldn't even cut thru saran wrap. I feel as though these knives are very cheaply made. The handles have good grips but you have to use a ton of force to cut anything, Very disappointed. Back to searching I go..
customer_reviews.author: JJ Wiest

customer_reviews.title: In a clutch this is... get these
customer_reviews.text: Beginners set.... in a clutch or first set ( house warming) it’s perfect . For an adult who doesn’t do that much cooking and just needs something that will cut different things . ( watermelon, chicken, a steak with dinner) This is great. If this for that more seasoned chef .. who really is needs a high quality tools...this won’t cut it (no pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: Autism Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love the Pop of Color!
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife set so far. Not sure if it's because I've been using a set of hand-me-down knives for the past ten years and they couldn't even cut through softened butter, or if it's the super yummy candy color of the handles. Regardless, these are making life in the kitchen fun again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Marie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a light cooker and these work great for my needs. they are sharp and the color looks great. I have put them in the dishwasher a few times now and there hasn't been any damage. I would buy these as a housewarming gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: C & C

customer_reviews.title: Take These Knives To The Gun Fight!  :/
customer_reviews.text: The color is brilliant and the knives sharp. I am pleased with this purchase, particularly in light of the reasonable price. I never place good knives in the dishwasher because doing so will cause the blade to dull. Okay, there is a sharpening tool that will fix it-- but not washing this quality of knife by hand is just, well, it ain't right. :)
customer_reviews.author: Beje

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife Set
customer_reviews.text: I love how these cut. They are sharp! They are definitely a bright color and red is my favorite. The handles fit securely in my hand and feel safe when I hold them. I didn’t use the block but attached a magnetic strip to my wall and the steak knives are in my silverware drawer. Very happy with my knives.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieD

customer_reviews.title: Am disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: Am disappointed in the quality...pretty to look at, but as far as quality...not worth what I paid for it...knives are showing rust around edges...have had to use brillo pads and still it hasn't come off! Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not sharp enough to cut threw chicken
customer_reviews.text: This set is super beautiful in color. I have always wanted a knife set so i was super excited to get this. The stand is nice black slick. The knifes r a beautiful teal color which i love. They r light weight. I however went to use them the other night for the 1st time to cut chicken and it wouldnt even cut threw the chicken. So wasnt super happy about that cuz if they cant cut threw meat it was a waste to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Celicia longaberger

customer_reviews.title: Light, Sharp, Durability Unknown
customer_reviews.text: These are not the heavy knives we have had over the years. There is a light weight feel to the handles and a thinness to the blades; thus, they are easier to manipulate and lighter to use, but more pressure is needed. Blades are sharp, don't yet know about durability and maintenance of sharp cutting edges.
customer_reviews.author: Pelican Pointe

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: The set is very nice, the hand grip on each is al nice and durable. The scissors feel super cheap. The color is not what I expected. I’m not 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.author: sarahdawn lomboy

customer_reviews.title: No problems and a thumbs up from this reviewer....
customer_reviews.text: Its a knife set. I would purchase it again if I was in need of knives again. I am doing my kitchen in red and it fit in nicely for that. I actually use different knives for cutting as these are pretty much for show on my countertop. I did try one out amd it seemed sufficient. But that was one use and nothing to really give a good idea on long term use. Good price, good product, Its worthy of a thumbs up in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want cheap knives
customer_reviews.text: If your goal is getting a set of cheap knives then that's what you'll get with these......cheap. They are, so fsr, very sharp. However, they are made of stainless steel and other reviews mentioned that forming if they weren't washed and immediately dried. I've done exactly that, but after only two days of use there is just appearing where the gang enters the handle. The handles aren't tight enough to keep water from entering. I'm considering returning them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cutlery set! The color is nice and the quality is really good for it's price. I wanted a Pioneer Woman version but doesn't have the budget, so this for me, is a great buy. I'll see in a few weeks if it holds. Will update if anything goes wrong (rust or anything).
customer_reviews.author: Amazona

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality - 2 Sets Came Rusted with Marks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on the positive reviews, but should have read all the negative ones. My first set looked used and rusted. I thought at first they were used and returned. There were marks on the handles and black material and rust near the blades. I decided to order a second one in hopes it was in fact used or maybe defective. The second set was a little better but every knife I opened had some sort of mark on the handle or rust on the blade. There was space between the handle and blade that you could see where the rust was building up. Clearly spending more money is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MMac8

customer_reviews.title: Thank Goodness for Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and looked at the photos and I'm glad I did. The picture would have you think the color is somewhat more of an aqua, which was not my color scheme. The product is turquoise just like the pic reviews and fits in perfectly with my kitchen.. The knives are small on the other side of the stove, but you can see the color scheme was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Sharp...your cutting board won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Knives are sharp. Almost too sharp. Completely score any cutting board I’ve used (3 different ones, different material). Basically ruined a brand new bamboo cutting board and a new hard plastic board. When cutting larger items, vegetables for instance, it feels off center and cuts at a curve. Hoping this is all just a learning curve getting adapted to a new set of knives after 10 years with the old set.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky DeBolt

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: The featured butcher block was black, but received the neutral color instead, but other than that this is a nice knife set and replaces my Kitchenaid set I received for a wedding gift 14 years ago. Turquoise is my color choice now.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love the colors of this set, I dislike a couple things. It’s not that big of a deal but you must know that it is recommended to wash these by hand, NOT in the dishwasher. Also, my set showed up with marks on it. The packaging that they came in was very protective and I cannot see how they could have gotten that damage to them during the shipping process. I am pretty upset that a couple of them showed up like this with protective coverage on it. Just be aware when buying this product. I may be mistaken and they were damaged during the shipping process, but I honestly do not see how.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Cost efficient
customer_reviews.text: Theses are very cheaply made and dull. I guess they are ok for the price. You get what you pay for sometimes. I do like the color, it’s exactly as pictured. It arrived on time and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kristeen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Felt cheap but has worked far better than initial expectation
customer_reviews.text: When I received them they felt cheap to me. However I got another set $80 for free right after and it felt the same way. The color is nice and it adds a splash of Personality to the kitchen. The knives are sharp and work well. I ended up gifting them to my mom who is very picky about her knives and she has loved them. Blue is her favorite color so that helps but the durability and feel/sharpness have been great for her. For being so inexpensive this was a steal. Only time will tell if this will hold up but they are great for now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ketcham

customer_reviews.title: These knives are good in terms of looks/esthetics
customer_reviews.text: These knives are good in terms of looks/esthetics, but the sharpness and cutting quality are quite poor. I would only buy if you are looking for a decorative set
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: SET IS NOT AS SHOWN IN PHOTO
customer_reviews.text: I like the knives, and the color of the handles to match my kitchen. However, Set is not as shown in photo. Knife block is not black, it is wooden pine colored. My kitchen is turquoise with black appliances, the reason I chose this set. Amazon was notified, sent replacement set which is the same as the first! SET IS NOT AS SHOWN IN PHOTO
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of money almost all knifes are messed up
customer_reviews.text: I would like to upload pics i took of these awful knives!! Almost every single knofe is messed up. Scuffs on the handles terrible noticeable imperfections on the blades. The block itself chunks missing this is absolutely uncalled for!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh Black

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for it's price
customer_reviews.text: The handle color is what I was expecting, but I am disappointed in the block color. The picture is black and the description says it's black, but its brown. The handles are plastic and overall the knives are not very strong. The blades themselves are ok, they cut when I need them to.
customer_reviews.author: TooMuchAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, sharp knives, shears are cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my apartment. Love the color of the handles and the overall look of it on the counter and it doesn't take up too much counter space. Knives are a bit thin, but very sharp out of the box. Been using it over a month and no rusting yet (hand wash and air dry only). Would give it 5 stars, but the shears already broke and I barely used it. Maybe used it less than ten before it broke in half.
customer_reviews.author: JAMphib

customer_reviews.title: Dirty handles
customer_reviews.text: The handles are very dirty and covered in oil, or dirt grease. Even after cleaning the knives, on the sides of the turquoise handles it is still dirty. The metal knives themselves are fine and sharp. Gave three stars because still useable just not something I want to keep out for the ethstic If my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey J.

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap knife set
customer_reviews.text: Has what you would want as far as knifes and stuff. I don't expect it to last a lifetime, but I hated the old knife set from the beginning that was owned for 10yrs. You can tell it is not a top of the line knife set...and you are not paying for a top of the line knife set. Enjoy and use until you decide what you want higher up the food chain or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GM77

customer_reviews.title: Cute Knife Set, but maybe a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my short-term rental, and they work great in there. Not sure I'd want them for my own use. They seem a bit flimsy. I'm curious to see how long they stay sharp. Nice looking and fun colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute knife set. Color is exactly as shown in pictures. My husband and I noticed that the knives started to have tiny spots of rust after just two weeks of use (see picture). I purchased this knife set mostly for its aesthetic look as the aqua color matches all my kitchen appliances. The knives are not the most comfortable handling set, the handles are made of a very lightweight hard plastic and the actual knives are a bit bendable and thin compared to my more expensive knives. This is a great knife set if you are just looking for something that looks super cute and price friendly :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Colors...
customer_reviews.text: I received my order quickly, but two pegs on the bottom of the block were broken. Instead of dealing with the return process., I made shift and fixed it with two wall screw protectors to give the block the even level with the other two pegs. It is a nice set for the price, but I guess just dont want to deal with the return hassle.
customer_reviews.author: range

customer_reviews.title: They're very dull, don't even cut paper.
customer_reviews.text: I got these cuz I thought they'd work got my household but they aren't sharp at all. I thought a new knife set would at least cut things but it wouldn't even cut paper. I am sending back & I've already ordered a new set from someone else & they're way better
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Was a great gift for mothers day!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely sharp and durable for what we paid. Made a great part of a mothers day gift set. I would highly recommend. Handles are solid also and they wash great in the dish washer.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H.

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: as soon as i took the knives out to place in the block , 2 knive scratched up the black surface . i would have returned but way to much work to repackage , disappointed
customer_reviews.author: LISA MARIE D

customer_reviews.title: Wow these knives are great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was very skeptica, but after over a month of use and runs through the dishwasher these things still look great. No rust, all knives are the same color, and i got the color block I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Butler

customer_reviews.title: Dull, but cute.
customer_reviews.text: These knives work great for cutting a sandwich or butter, if you need to cut a raw potato, your gonna need a sharper weapon. They are cute, but barely functional!
customer_reviews.author: Kateri Killian

customer_reviews.title: Over priced for quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set of knives based upon the color of the handle. While they look amazing on my kitchen counter top, they are worthless. All the blades are seraded and are not able to be sharpened. With use the blades cut up the black knife block leaving visible wood colored diggers. You basically have to saw anything you want to cut. Does not cut straight smooth lines. Wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Decent for $$
customer_reviews.text: Decent set for the price. The knives are not as sharp as my last set, but this set was less than half the price. Make sure you hand wash and completely dry each knife to avoid rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I ignored all the negative reviews and ordered this set because it was the colors that I wanted for my kitchen. Big mistake! The scissors would not cut anything but a basic, thin piece of paper. I use my kitchen scissors a lot. I don't know how good the knives were. After trying to use the scissors, I boxed it up and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap yet Effective
customer_reviews.text: I do not mean that these are cheapily made. They are a fantastic value and a great color. I live alone, so it has all of the essentials without taking up too much of my counter space. The knives are sharp and dishwasher safe too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Glad they were on sale
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice, new knife set and thought that these were pretty. I read the reviews before purchasing them and was prepared for a few scuffs and marks on the handles. Had I not read the reviews nor got them on sale, I would have been very disappointed. Thankfully, most of the marks washed off, but there were some scuffs that are permanent. I haven't used them yet, but they do seem sturdy. Overall, I'm glad to have a newish set of knives and am willing to put up with a few scuffs in exchange for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Update after 2 years: 4 steak knives and 3 others are cracking at the handle, though for now they all still function. I do dishwash them so perhaps this shortened their life span. I have not felt with rust like some others mentioned. Love these! Beautiful AND useful. Came very sharp. I dishwash mine and they're doing great.
customer_reviews.author: TrishaChristine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Rusty. I’ve had em two months. Wish I read the reviews beforehand. The scissors are extremely dull. Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these knives for a little over a month and rust spots have started to appear. Can’t return them anymore because it went over 30 days smh. I recommend you don’t buy these knives. This is horrible. One of the worst purchases I’ve made on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Marckixks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing knife set
customer_reviews.text: Best knife set I've ever used. I absolutely love the color of the knife handles and the quality is amazing. I use these knives everyday and they cut through anything as smoothly and easy as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: They do not cut good.
customer_reviews.text: They may be pretty and all but when it comes to cutting meat and other stuff it does not work at all waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ariadne Barcelo

customer_reviews.title: Love this cutlery set
customer_reviews.text: I love this cutlery set, The color is so pretty! I do recommend it I love using the knives they are great.... I recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Ricki E

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I'm please with my purchase so for so good vibrant red color, sharp cut right through with out any pressure I will recommend this product 👍
customer_reviews.author: adelina

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I needed to replace my twelve year old knives set. I love the color, design and sturdiness of these knives. It is a great addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Scissors work! Knives don't!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty to look at. But, poor performance. Scissors work well. Knives are worthless. Should have sent back, but illness kept me from opening til weeks after receiving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: dont waste your money cheap an cheerful but knife ‘s are very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Aj  strong

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice set...not an expensive set but looks awesome on my counter. !! Used 2 knives so far both cut nicely.well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: pattie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable in the hand.
customer_reviews.text: SHARP, high grade knives. Hadn't replaced kitchen knives in 26 years. Very surprised with quality. Oster is a good brand in my kitchen. Very happy. Great buy. Easy on the wallet, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors and needed a new set. All is working well so far. My only negative is the knife block arrived damaged. It is chipped through to the wood on one corner.
customer_reviews.author: QT in Ptown

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Got it cause it match my kitchen n I needed more knife they packed great n safe to unpack
customer_reviews.author: Blaxican

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a win
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this. Love the coloe, how sharp the blades are and how great it looks in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: These steak knives are terrible, i do not recommend if you plan on actually using them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price. And very pretty!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price the quality is ok. The color is really nice. These are no Cutco but they’re actually not that bad. They’re very sharp. A little on the thin side but then again for the price they’re not bad at all. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Orly Babin

customer_reviews.title: Scuff and rust is true :(
customer_reviews.text: Scuff marks and rust on knives. Was hoping the bad reviews were false.. Just got them and set them up. Have only used one knife and it’s none of the photo'd ones :(
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Great for gifting, the block is a warm tone, beautiful color handles and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to go in my rv. So far it’s holding up great. It get used about 10-15 times a year. So I think they will last. Good color and do a good job for me.
customer_reviews.author: toni

customer_reviews.title: Love Mine...
customer_reviews.text: My brand new red knives came in perfect condition. They are sharp. Pretty, a true red. The wooden block in sturdy and in perfect condition. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Woitasek

customer_reviews.title: Returning.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as though it had been used. Scratched handle and water stains and appeared dirty. Seeing as other reviews have reported the same problem, I will be returning and will not be ordering again. Unfortunate as this is a really pretty set.
customer_reviews.author: mary desena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, they are so much prettier than the picture! And they are very sharp! The only con is that they have to sit on the awkward counter in the kitchen because my wall counters are too low and you can't pull the big ones out.
customer_reviews.author: Emili Widmer

customer_reviews.title: Cutting ability is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Gave one point for teal color. Sorry they don’t cut squat even after good sharpening!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I've tossed my old knives for these. The knife is sturdy and has a good weight when you hold it. The blades are super sharp and cut cleanly and easily. The color is so fun and looks great sitting on my counter top. I would recommend these to others...I already have!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great Cutlery Set!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are very sharp! I've bought others that seemed like they needed to be sharpened before using them. So I was pleasantly pleased that these were already sharp. They look amazing with our Lake House remodel and new color scheme. I would highly recommend! ~NB~
customer_reviews.author: RockStar*

customer_reviews.title: My favorite thing in my kitchen!!
customer_reviews.text: MY FAVORITE SET! Its so beautiful and appealing to the eye on my counter! Dishwasher safe and durable! It's my favorite thing in my kitchen! ❤
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. High quality. Great color. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for when i moved out for college. Absolutely love and has lasted forever!
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: All the knives I need
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. I used a gift card to purchase it. It matches my color scheme and they are durable.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely happy with this purchase. Quality is amazing. Knives very sturdy & sharp. Presentation is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Costilla Haro

customer_reviews.title: The blades are dull and dont cut through much
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I thought that because it was an oster product it would he quality. Nope. These are cute, but not functional. The blades are dull and dont cut through much.
customer_reviews.author: chandra johnson

customer_reviews.title: Crap waste of money
customer_reviews.text: They look pretty. If all you want is for looks these are the knives for you. Not even a little sharp. Like cutting toast was a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G. Machado

customer_reviews.title: Great knives!
customer_reviews.text: There is no chefs knife. Chefs knives have a sharp, non-serrated blade. There is no knife in this set that isn’t serrated.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina L. Meister

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: If you spend a lot of time in the kitchen, like myself, save a little more and get something better than these. They are absolutely horrible, inefficient and difficult to use. I bought them for the color to match my other kitchen decor, and sure they are pretty. But not worth it. Also, the scissors that came with them won't even cut through paper??? Huge regret.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: These knives are pretty and very sharp. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great starter knife set for the price. Has everything I needed and love the color. Only thing is that in the picture it has a black holder and when it arrived it was wood colored.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price. Not the most durable set but I bam sure it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice knives, Wrong color base
customer_reviews.text: The set is very nice for the price. I took a star off, because I ordered the set with the black base and received this natural wood base instead.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Weathersby

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: These knives are not that good they do not cut good and they have rusted a little after washing in my dishwasher only after a few times
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Makes my kitchen complete!
customer_reviews.text: I like this set. It's very nice for a starting house set. Everything is so sturdy and wonderful, it's my first knife set I've ever bought for myself and I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Average Home

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a couple of months now and have been using them. They are super durable and well worth buying! The color adds a nice touch to our kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set
customer_reviews.text: Just what l needed in the set they work great
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: These knives are terrible and not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Every single knife has serrated edges and cannot be used for chopping. It would be like trying to use a bread knife to chop vegetables...not sure what every knife in this set is like that, but essentially useless to cut any veggies or fruits like apples, etc.
customer_reviews.author: EEP

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful and useful!
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty! And sharp and easy to take care of. I'm so pleased with them!
customer_reviews.author: Kshelley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. I was looking for a nice knife set that also matched my kitchen and this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: Great knives/ love the color
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments! I was surprised at how sharp they were and how easy it was to cut food. Our stager even left them on the counter for the staging photos because the aqua matched my kitchen. He never lets petiole leave things on the counter, but the knives were an exception.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Pippin

customer_reviews.title: GF Loves This Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my GF as a Christmas gift and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Merkey

customer_reviews.title: Rust!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sorry I had to leave this low stars. They are all rusted. They are so cute and really sharp but unfortunately they are all rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have read reviews, these are so flimsy. I’ll replace them eventually as they get the job done for now. But seriously, they’re so flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Malmö

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Sat them on my kitchen counter the scissors and knives cut very well
customer_reviews.author: Cora Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy very dull knifes
customer_reviews.text: The worst knife set ever !! Ever single knife is dull can’t cut nothing . Even the scissors are dull don’t waste your money

product_meta.title: Oster Evansville 14 Piece Cutlery Set, Stainless Steel with Turquoise Handles -
product_meta.description: Size:14-Piece| Color:Turquoise/WoodMake sure all your slicing and dicing needs are met with the comprehensive Oster Evansville 14 Piece Stainless Steel Cutlery Set. Each piece of this collection boasts precision and durability, and its sleek look is complemented by a beautiful stainless steel finish. It features stain and rust resistant stainless steel blades and full tang turquoise handles for balance. All pieces are stored in a handy black rubberwood block, adding elegance to your countertop. Features ergonomically designed handles for comfort. Recommended Use - Residential
feature_bullets: Precision stamped construction for durability through the full length of the knife, with Full Tang Blades for Excellent Balance
High quality stainless steel blade is stain and rust resistant
Hand wash to keep knives sharp
One 8in Chef Knife, one 7in Santoku Knife, one 8in Bread Knife, one 5in Utility Knife, one 3.5in Paring Knife, six 4.5in Steak Knives, one Sharpener, Kitchen Scissors, one Rubberwood Block

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,103 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
